title: About Polish regional cookery
description: Polish regional cookery may be differentiated according to several main areas: the Podhalanski, Silesian, Malopolski, Wielkopolski, Mazowiecki, Mazursko-Warminski and Pomorski areas. The differences and the type of regional peasant food were determined, firstly, by the type of economic agricultural and trade factors and by the wealth of the natural, geographical environment and secondly, by the traditional taste preferences.
